participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and health-conscious, Emily is always aiming for her personal best in competitions.
participant_1.background: I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon. My favorite color is purple. I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body. I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion. My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and thoughtful, Jake has a deep appreciation for family and enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I have a soft spot for my parents and sweets. I love watching sitcoms on television. I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix. My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels. No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey! What's up?
Not much, just getting ready for my marathon tomorrow.
Oh cool! Good luck! What's your favorite color?
Thanks! It's purple. What's yours?
Mine is blue. I love the ocean. What do you do for fun?
I like to exercise, read, and spend time with my family.
That's nice. I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix.
I've heard of Asterix, but I haven't read it. What's it about?
It's a comic series about a Gaulish village that resists Roman occupation. It's really funny.
That sounds cool. I'll have to check it out.
You should! What do you like to watch on TV?
I love watching sitcoms. My favorite is The Big Bang Theory.
Oh, I love that show! I'm a huge fan of Sheldon.
Me too! He's the best character on the show.
I agree. He's so funny.
What are your favorite websites?
My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels.
That's great. I'm glad you're working on your recovery.
Thank you. I'm really trying.
I admire that.
Do you like to wear comfortable clothes?
No, not really. I like to dress up.
That's cool. I prefer to be comfortable.
I like to be comfortable too, but I like to look nice.
I guess we're opposites in that way.
We are, but that's okay.
Yeah, it is.
